front.title: DHCP Options for Conveying Port Mask and Port Range Router IP Address

abstract.t: This draft defines two new DHCP (Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol, [RFC2131]) Options to be used in the context of Provider-Provisioned CPE solution (a.k.a. Port Range solution or Fractional Address). The first option is used to convey a Port Mask and the second one may be used to convey a list of Port Range Router IP addresses.
